div.p: Enter through the winding drive past woods and ponds flourishing with life to the secluded enclave of Orchard Hills West. This community of 42 select homesites nestled back amongst rolling woods and preserved wetlands is the perfect setting for your new home. Orchard Hills West is close to everything that’s anything, from travel routes to world class dining and shopping. With our customized approach to building and numerous walkout lower level homesites we are sure to offer something for the most distinguishing clients.
